mapper.select:
SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.CNTR_NO || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR/*계약상세번호*/ , (SELECT CST_KNM FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS S1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.CST_NO = T1.CST_NO AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T2.SELL_TP_CD , NVL(T3.RVE_AMT_DP,0) - NVL(T3.RVE_AMT_RF,0) AS DP_AMT /*입금총액*/ , T1.RVE_AMT AS RVE_AMT /*지급금액*/ , T1.RVE_AMT AS RFND_DSB_AMT /*환불금액*/ , NVL(T4.RFND_DSB_PSP_INT , 0 ) AS RFND_DSB_PSP_INT /*지연이자*/ , NVL(T4.RFND_DDTN_AMT ,0) AS RFND_DDTN_AMT /*카드공제*/ , T4.CSH_RFND_FNIT_CD AS CSH_RFND_FNIT_CD /*은행/카드사*/ , NVL((SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD S1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND FNIT_CD = T4.CARD_RFND_FNIT_CD AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'),'') AS CSH_FNIT_NM /*은행*/ , T4.CARD_RFND_FNIT_CD , NVL((SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD S1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND FNIT_CD = T4.CARD_RFND_FNIT_CD AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'),'') AS CARD_FNIT_NM /*카드사*/ , T4.CSH_RFND_ACNO_ENCR AS CSH_RFND_ACNO_ENCR /* 계좌번호 */ , T4.CARD_RFND_CRCDNO_ENCR AS CARD_RFND_CRCDNO_ENCR /* 카드번호 */ , NVL(T4.CSH_RFND_DLGPS_NM , T4.CARD_RFND_CRCDONR_NM) AS CSH_RFND_ACOWN_NM , (SELECT SELL_TP_CD FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL S1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.CNTR_NO = T4.BLTF_OJ_CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = T4.BLTF_OJ_CNTR_SN AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS SELL_TP_DTL_CD /*전금 판매유형*/ , '' AS RVE_DV_CD /*입금유형*/ , T6.CNTR_CST_NO AS CST_NO , (SELECT CST_KNM FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS S1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.CST_NO = T6.CNTR_CST_NO AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS TMP2 /*전금고객명*/ FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL T1 /*수납상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 /*계약상세*/ ON ( T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*삭제여부*/ AND T2.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd}
AND T2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd} /* 판매유형상세 */
) INNER JOIN (SELECT S1.CNTR_NO /*게약번호*/ , S1.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , SUM( CASE WHEN S1.DP_DV_CD IN ('1' , '3') THEN S1.RVE_AMT END ) AS RVE_AMT_DP /*입금금액*/ , SUM( CASE WHEN S1.DP_DV_CD IN ('2' , '4') THEN S1.RVE_AMT END ) AS RVE_AMT_RF /*환불금액*/ FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL S1 /*수납상세*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.KW_GRP_CO_CD = '2000' AND S1.RVE_DV_CD IN ('03' , '04' ,'05' ,'09' , '17') AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY S1.CNTR_NO , S1.CNTR_SN) T3 ON ( T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_RFND_RCP_DTL T4 ON ( T4.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T4.RFND_RCP_NO = T1.RVE_OJ_DRM_NO1 AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_RFND_RCP_BAS T5 ON ( T5.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T4.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T5.RFND_RCP_NO = T4.RFND_RCP_NO AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T5.RFND_STAT_CD = '03') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T6 ON ( T6.CNTR_NO = T4.BLTF_OJ_CNTR_NO AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD = '2000'
AND T1.RVE_DT >= #{rveDtStart} /* 수납일자 */
AND T1.RVE_DT <= #{rveDtFinish} /* 수납일자 */
AND T1.PERF_DT >= #{perfDtStart} /* 실적일자 */
AND T1.PERF_DT <= #{perfDtFinish} /* 실적일자 */
AND T4.RFND_DSB_DV_CD = '04' /* 환불접수상세.환불지급구분코드 = 04.귀속 */
AND T4.RFND_DSB_DV_CD != '04' /* 환불접수상세.환불지급구분코드 != 04.귀속 */
AND T1.DP_DV_CD IN ('2','4') AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /* 수납상세.입금구분코드 조건 없음 = 전체 */
AND T1.DP_MES_CD = '06' /* 수납상세.입금구분코드 = 06.포인트 */
AND T1.DP_MES_CD != '06' /* 수납상세.입금구분코드 != 06.포인트 제외 */
AND (T1.RVE_DV_CD IN ('03' , '04' ,'05' , '17')) /* 수납상세.수납구분코드 != 09.대손이관 = 일반 테스트용 임시주석*/
AND (T1.RVE_DV_CD = '09') /* 수납상세.수납구분코드 = 09.대손이관 = 대손구분 테스트용 임시주석 */
ORDER BY T1.RVE_DT , T1.PERF_DT , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN

SELECT SELL_DTL_NM AS REFUND_DIVISION , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN M1.DP_MES_CD = '01' THEN RFND_CSH_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) AS RFND_DSB_AMT , NVL(SUM(RFND_DDTN_AMT),0) AS RFND_DDTN_AMT , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN DP_MES_CD = '02'AND CRDCD_FNIT_CD = '361' THEN RFND_CSH_AMT END),0) AS BC_RFND_DSB_AMT , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN DP_MES_CD = '02'AND CRDCD_FNIT_CD = '381' THEN RFND_CSH_AMT END),0) AS KB_RFND_DSB_AMT , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN DP_MES_CD = '02'AND CRDCD_FNIT_CD = '374' THEN RFND_CSH_AMT END),0) AS HN_RFND_DSB_AMT , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN DP_MES_CD = '02'AND CRDCD_FNIT_CD = '366' THEN RFND_CSH_AMT END),0) AS SH_RFND_DSB_AMT , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN DP_MES_CD = '02'AND CRDCD_FNIT_CD = '365' THEN RFND_CSH_AMT END),0) AS SS_RFND_DSB_AMT , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN DP_MES_CD = '02'AND CRDCD_FNIT_CD = '367' THEN RFND_CSH_AMT END),0) AS HD_RFND_DSB_AMT , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN DP_MES_CD = '02'AND CRDCD_FNIT_CD = '368' THEN RFND_CSH_AMT END),0) AS LT_RFND_DSB_AMT , NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN DP_MES_CD = '02'AND CRDCD_FNIT_CD = '371' THEN RFND_CSH_AMT END),0) AS NH_RFND_DSB_AMT , NVL(SUM(RFND_CSH_AMT),0) AS SUM_RFND_DSB_DDTN_AMT , NVL(SUM(RFND_DSB_PSP_INT) , 0 ) AS SUM_RFND_DSB_PSP_INT FROM ( SELECT T2.SELL_TP_CD , T2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD , CASE WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '2' THEN CASE WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21' , '23') THEN '21' WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '22' THEN '22' WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '24' THEN '24' WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '25' THEN '25' WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '26' THEN '26' END WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '3' THEN CASE WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('31','32') THEN '31' ELSE '32' END WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '6' THEN '61' END AS SELL_DTL , CASE WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '2' THEN CASE WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21' , '23') THEN RVE_AMT WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '22' THEN RVE_AMT WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '24' THEN RVE_AMT WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '25' THEN RVE_AMT WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '26' THEN RVE_AMT END WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '3' THEN CASE WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('31','32') THEN RVE_AMT WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD NOT IN ('31','32') THEN RVE_AMT END WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '6' THEN RVE_AMT END AS RFND_CSH_AMT , CASE WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '2' THEN CASE WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21' , '23') THEN '렌탈' WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '22' THEN '리스' WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '24' THEN '환경리스' WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '25' THEN '장기할부' WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '26' THEN '환경할부' END WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '3' THEN CASE WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('31','32') THEN '멤버' WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD NOT IN ('31','32') THEN '케어' END WHEN T2.SELL_TP_CD = '6' THEN '정기배송' END AS SELL_DTL_NM , T4.CSH_RFND_FNIT_CD AS CSH_RFND_FNIT_CD /*은행*/ , T4.CARD_RFND_FNIT_CD AS CRDCD_FNIT_CD /*카드사*/ , T1.DP_MES_CD /*입금수단*/ , T4.RFND_DDTN_AMT /*공제금액*/ , T4.RFND_DSB_PSP_INT /*지연이자*/ , T1.DP_TP_CD FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL T1 /*수납상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 /*계약상세*/ ON ( T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*삭제여부*/ AND T2.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd}
AND T2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd} /* 판매유형상세 */
) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_RFND_RCP_DTL T4 ON ( T4.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T4.RFND_RCP_NO = T1.RVE_OJ_DRM_NO1 AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_RFND_RCP_BAS T5 ON ( T5.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T4.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T5.RFND_RCP_NO = T4.RFND_RCP_NO AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T5.RFND_STAT_CD = '03') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T6 ON ( T6.CNTR_NO = T4.BLTF_OJ_CNTR_NO AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD = '2000'
AND T1.RVE_DT >= #{rveDtStart} /* 수납일자 */
AND T1.RVE_DT <= #{rveDtFinish} /* 수납일자 */
AND T1.PERF_DT >= #{perfDtStart} /* 실적일자 */
AND T1.PERF_DT <= #{perfDtFinish} /* 실적일자 */
AND T4.RFND_DSB_DV_CD = '04' /* 환불접수상세.환불지급구분코드 = 04.귀속 */
AND T4.RFND_DSB_DV_CD != '04' /* 환불접수상세.환불지급구분코드 != 04.귀속 */
/* 수납상세.입금구분코드 조건 없음 = 전체 */
AND T1.DP_MES_CD = '06' /* 수납상세.입금구분코드 = 06.포인트 */
AND T1.DP_MES_CD != '06' /* 수납상세.입금구분코드 != 06.포인트 제외 */
AND (T1.RVE_DV_CD IN ('03' , '04' ,'05' , '17')) /* 수납상세.수납구분코드 != 09.대손이관 = 일반 테스트용 임시주석*/
AND (T1.RVE_DV_CD = '09') /* 수납상세.수납구분코드 = 09.대손이관 = 대손구분 테스트용 임시주석 */
AND T1.DP_DV_CD IN ('2') AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND DP_MES_CD != 06 AND DP_TP_CD !='0605' ) M1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND SELL_DTL IS NOT NULL GROUP BY SELL_DTL , SELL_DTL_NM ORDER BY SELL_DTL , SELL_DTL_NM

SELECT M1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD AS REFUND_DIVISION , SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '21' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RT_RFND_DSB_AMT /*렌탈*/ , SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '22' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS LS_RFND_DSB_AMT /*리스*/ , SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '24' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS EL_RFND_DSB_AMT /*환경리스*/ , SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '31' OR M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '32' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS MB_RFND_DSB_AMT /*맴버십*/ , SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '33' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS HC_RFND_DSB_AMT /*홈케어맴버십*/ , SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '25' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS LN_RFND_DSB_AMT /*장기할부*/ , NVL(SUM(LM_RFND_DSB_AMT),0) AS LM_RFND_DSB_AMT /*할부금*/ , NVL(SUM(KM_RFND_DSB_AMT),0) AS KM_RFND_DSB_AMT /*K머니*/ , SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '61' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RG_RFND_DSB_AMT /*정기배송*/ , SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '21' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '22' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '24' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '31' OR M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '32' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '33' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '25' THEN M2.RFND_BLTF_AMT ELSE 0 END) + NVL(SUM(LM_RFND_DSB_AMT),0) + NVL(SUM(KM_RFND_DSB_AMT),0) AS SUM_RFND_DSB_AMT FROM (SELECT A1.CD_VLD_VAL SELL_TP_DTL_CD , B1.MLNG_CNTN SELL_TP_DTL_NM FROM T_CMZ_CD_D A1 JOIN T_CMZ_MLNG_D B1 ON B1.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B1.MLNG_ID = A1.CD_DTL_MLNG_ID AND B1.LNG_ID = 'ko' AND B1.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' WHERE A1.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND A1.CD_ID = 'SELL_TP_DTL_CD' AND A1.CD_VLD_VAL IN ('21', '22', '24', '25', '26', '31', '32', '33','61') ) M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SELL_TP_CD , SELL_TP_DTL_CD , SUM(RFND_BLTF_AMT) AS RFND_BLTF_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T4.RVE_DV_CD = '03' THEN T4.RVE_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS LM_RFND_DSB_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T4.DP_TP_CD = '0802' THEN T4.RVE_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS KM_RFND_DSB_AMT FROM TB_RVDW_RFND_RCP_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_RVDW_RFND_RCP_DTL T2 /*환불접수상세*/ ON ( T2.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T2.RFND_RCP_NO = T1.RFND_RCP_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T3 /*계약상세*/ ON ( T3.CNTR_NO = T2.BLTF_OJ_CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T2.BLTF_OJ_CNTR_SN AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') INNER JOIN TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL T4 /*수납상세*/ ON ( T4.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T2.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T4.RVE_NO = T2.RVE_NO AND T4.RVE_SN = T2.RVE_SN AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') INNER JOIN TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS T5 /*통합입금번호*/ ON T5.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T4.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T5.ITG_DP_NO = T4.ITG_DP_NO AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.RFND_RVE_DT >= #{rveDtStart} /* 수납일자 */
AND T1.RFND_RVE_DT <= #{rveDtFinish} /* 수납일자 */
AND T1.RFND_PERF_DT >= #{perfDtStart} /* 실적일자 */
AND T1.RFND_PERF_DT <= #{perfDtFinish} /* 실적일자 */
AND T2.RFND_DSB_DV_CD = '04' /* 환불접수상세.환불지급구분코드 = 04.귀속 */
AND T2.RFND_DSB_DV_CD != '04' /* 환불접수상세.환불지급구분코드 != 04.귀속 */
AND T3.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd}
AND T3.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd} /* 판매유형상세 */
/* 수납상세.입금구분코드 조건 없음 = 전체 */
AND T4.DP_MES_CD = '06' /* 수납상세.입금구분코드 = 06.포인트 */
AND T4.DP_MES_CD != '06' /* 수납상세.입금구분코드 != 06.포인트 제외 */
GROUP BY T3.SELL_TP_CD , T3.SELL_TP_DTL_CD ) M2 ON ( M2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = M1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD) GROUP BY M1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD , M1.SELL_TP_DTL_NM ORDER BY M1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD
